Real-time data integration platform

StreamDuo is a platform for B2B data sharing. Make any data available to your partners in real-time, without any API hosting.

Real Time

StreamDuo processes your data in real-time, letting you stream data to your partners instantaneously.

No Code

Establish a data stream with no code, and no API hosting. We host endpoints and manage authentication, allowing you to use client side tools, or connectors from your favorite IPaSS vendors like Fivetran.

Secure

Granular management of authentication and access in the StreamDuo console ensures you know who can access your data.

Manage data integrations across partners in one place

Manage all your external data integrations in one place. See real-time analytics on your streams, sample records, and monitor which records have been read. From the StreamDuo console you can:

  • Grant and revoke access
  • Monitor read status of records
  • Inspect records

For examples of how StreamDuo can provide value, explore some of our Use Cases.

Flexible options for reading and writing

The StreamDuo APIs offer many options for reading and writing:

  • REST API
  • No code IPaaS connectors
  • Bulk file upload/download
  • Python SDK

See our Documentation for more details on how you can interact with StreamDuo, or explore the API directly.

Request an invitation to try StreamDuo for free
